unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? My experience with online shopping, especially during Diwali sales, has been mixed! Once, I ordered a saree, but the color was totally off from what I saw. The return was easy thankfully! Another time, it was a hassle. I feel like transparent return policies are key. Else, 'jaan nikal jaati hai'! Makes you crave some good Hyderabadi biryani after all that stress, no? What are your thoughts?
normalised: Okay, so return policies, right? My experience with online shopping, especially during D-i-w-a-l-i sales, has been mixed! Once, I ordered a saree, but the color was totally off from what I saw. The return was easy thankfully! Another time, it was a hassle. I feel like transparent return policies are key. Else, 'jaan nikal jaati hai'! Makes you crave some good H-y-d-e-r-a-b-a-d-i biryani after all that stress, no? What are your thoughts?
